meanings: (이야기하다, 잡담하다) talk, chat (away), (시끄럽게) make noise, be[get] noisy, clamor
실용회화-화났을 때 · 비난 다툼 등 Don't be so noisy.

meanings.meaning: without being in the least disconcerted
People who make no noise are dangerous.

vlive.korean: 아 맞다 너 영화 보고 막 혼자 떠들지 말고! Oh, don't talk too much after the movie is over. 듣기 View video Dingo Story / 딩고스토리 : 기념일에 커플이 헤어지는 이유_EP04 [라이크]
vlive.english: Oh, don't talk too much after the movie is over.

vlive.korean: [설아 님 말씀하시는데 어디 감히 바퀴 달린 철덩어리가 떠들지?] [How dare those pieces of metal with wheels be noisy when she's talking?] View video V PICK! : [WJSN] 📣다들 조용!! 설아님 말씀하신다!!! (SEOLA talking about members)
vlive.english: [How dare those pieces of metal with wheels be noisy when she's talking?]
